info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Columbia, northeastern Albany and southern Rensselaer Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1059 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rensselaer, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Albany, Troy, East Greenbush, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Nassau, Latham, Delmar, Guilderland, Menands, Stephentown, Voorheesville, Altamont, Castleton-On-Hudson, Loudonville, West Sand Lake, Wyantskill, Averill Park and Wynantskill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 25. Interstate 87 between exits 23 and 6. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
